item.title: Joseph Yoon
item.description: Joseph Yoon is a senior finishing his undergraduate degree in Civil & Environmental Engineering at UMass Amherst. Afterwards, he aims to pursue a Master degree in Environmental Engineering. In the process of finding a specific interest, he has worked on renewable energy at an internship, conducted field work in salt marshes, worked on grit removal at the Amherst wastewater treatment plant, and is now exploring the realm of programming and hydrologic modeling for his independent study. Current hobbies include rock climbing, hiking, and eating good food.
